name: Quiz Master App v2 & v3
description: Advanced quiz application with enhanced features, user authentication, progress tracking, and a modern responsive interface. Built with React.js and Node.js backend.

name: Web-Based Games
description: Collection of interactive web games including puzzle games, memory games, and strategy games. Features smooth animations, score tracking, and mobile-responsive design.

name: Video-Conference App
description: Real-time video conferencing application with features like screen sharing, chat functionality, recording capabilities, and secure user authentication. Built with WebRTC and Socket.io.

name: Money Transfer App
description: Secure web application for collecting and managing donations with payment gateway integration, donor management, and detailed reporting. Features SSL encryption and secure payment processing.

name: LLM Assistant
description: Intelligent AI assistant powered by large language models with natural language processing, context awareness, and integration capabilities. Built with Python and modern AI frameworks.
